attention3.ptxt: After reprogramming of ECM is executed, if the DTC P0607 is indicated, it is possible that the reprogramming of ECM is not completed correctly.

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met.

item.ptxt: Internal failure in ECM is detected.
Internal failure related to electric throttle control system in ECM is detected.

entry.ptxt: (1 D/C detection logic), (1 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up) or (2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

item.ptxt: ECM power supply circuit and/or ground circuit

ptxt.emph: P2610: ECM/PCM Internal Engine Off Timer Performance

entry.ptxt: Failure of engine off timer in ECM is detected.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

servinfosub.title: System Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Internal control module is installed in ECM.

s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position for 1 min or more.

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Clear DTC referring to DTC Clearance:N32A .
Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Perform DTC confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0607 or P2610 still detected?

action.ptxt: Execute reprogramming of ECM correctly once again.

testgroup.title: ECM power and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check ECM power supply and ground circuit.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) detected at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
